name: Station (dpoulsen)
description:
Station is an alt horror game.

A surrealist haunting. 

You awake in a world engulfed in fog. You have lost
your name, your body, and everything that makes you, 
you. There are only shadows and notes from previous
inhabitants. You must find a way out. 

Premiered at It's a Bloody Nightmare on June 2 2019 at Inclusive Arts London

It is a demo

Press X ,  Esc or right mouse button to bring up the menu. 

Tiles by VexedEnigma
